ext.description: Full clang-tidy management with smart hints and fixes
command.filterByCategoryAtCursor: Clang-Tidy: Filter by Category at Cursor
command.filterByCheckAtCursor: Clang-Tidy: Filter by Check at Cursor
command.fixAllProjectDryRun: Clang-Tidy: Fix All in Project (Dry Run)
config.title: Clang-Tidy
config.compileCommandsPath: Path to compile_commands.json. If empty, search from workspace root.
config.onType: Run clang-tidy while typing (debounced, active file only).
config.fallbackToCli: Fallback to clang-tidy CLI when the daemon is unavailable (slower, no fix-its).
config.quickChecks: Checks override for quick mode (clang-tidy -checks=). Empty means use .clang-tidy.
config.searchExcludeDirs: Directories to skip when searching for compile_commands.json.
config.searchDepth: Max directory depth for searching compile_commands.json.
config.autoDetectPlugins: Auto-detect clang-tidy plugin libraries in the workspace.
config.pluginPaths: Additional clang-tidy plugin paths (files or directories).
config.pluginSearchDepth: Max directory depth for searching clang-tidy plugins.
config.pluginNameHints: Filename hints used to detect plugin libraries.
config.minVersion: Minimum recommended clang-tidy major version (0 to disable).
config.daemonPath: Optional path to clang-tidy daemon binary.
config.categoryRules: Rules for mapping clang-tidy check names to categories (prefix or regex).
config.categoryColors: Per-category highlight colors. Each category can set background, border, and overviewRuler colors.
config.showCategoryLabels: Show inline category labels (perf/read/bug/etc) next to highlighted code.
config.updateDebounceMs: Debounce window (ms) for UI updates (decorations, findings).
config.maxDiagnosticsPerFile: Maximum diagnostics stored per file (0 = unlimited).
config.maxFixesPerFile: Maximum fix-its stored per file (0 = unlimited).
config.maxTotalDiagnostics: Soft cap for total diagnostics kept in memory.
config.failSafeTotalDiagnostics: Fail-safe threshold for total diagnostics (auto-cancel analysis).
config.failSafeAutoCancel: Cancel analysis automatically when fail-safe triggers.
config.findingsPageSize: Page size for Findings view (0 = no paging).
config.baselineEnabled: Show only diagnostics that are not part of the saved baseline.
config.projectBatchSize: Batch size for project analysis (0 = no batching).
config.projectDiffOnly: Analyze only changed git files (staged/unstaged) for project runs.
config.projectDiffIncludeUntracked: Include untracked files in diff-only project analysis.
config.projectIncremental: Analyze only changed files during project runs.
config.projectPrioritizeActive: Analyze active file first during project runs.
config.projectPrioritizeOpen: Analyze open files before the rest during project runs.
config.projectAdaptiveBatching: Enable adaptive project batching when the UI/daemon is under load.
config.projectAdaptiveMinBatchSize: Minimum batch size when adaptive batching is enabled.
config.showSummaryStatus: Show category summary in the status bar.
config.autoLoadPersistedOnStartup: Auto-load persisted results on startup (Findings view and cached diagnostics).
config.persistDebounceMs: Debounce window (ms) for persisting results to disk.
config.daemonCacheOnDisk: Enable daemon disk cache for clang-tidy results.
config.daemonAutoRestart: Automatically restart the daemon if it exits or becomes unresponsive.
config.daemonRestartMaxAttempts: Max restart attempts before giving up.
config.daemonHealthCheckIntervalMs: Health check interval (ms) for the daemon (0 = disabled).
config.daemonCacheDir: Custom directory for daemon disk cache (defaults to .vscode/clang-tidy-daemon-cache).
config.perFileTimeoutMs: Timeout (ms) per file when running clang-tidy (0 = no timeout).
config.publishDiagnosticsThrottleMs: Throttle publishDiagnostics notifications (ms between messages, 0 = no throttle).
config.useUnsavedBuffer: Analyze unsaved editor content for the active file.
config.unsavedBufferMaxBytes: Maximum size of unsaved buffer to send to the daemon (0 = unlimited).
msg.daemonNotFound: Clang-Tidy daemon not found. Set clangTidy.daemonPath or place a platform binary in extension/bin. ({0})
msg.daemonInitFailedShort: Failed to initialize clang-tidy daemon. See Output for details.
msg.daemonRestartScheduled: Clang-Tidy daemon restart scheduled in {0} ms (attempt {1}).
msg.daemonRestartGiveUp: Clang-Tidy daemon restart limit reached. Manual restart required.
msg.daemonFallback: Clang-Tidy daemon not found. Falling back to CLI mode (slower, no fix-its). ({0})
msg.cliClangTidyMissing: clang-tidy not found for CLI fallback.
msg.cliUnsavedSkipped: Clang-Tidy CLI fallback uses saved files only. Save to refresh diagnostics.
msg.compileCommandsMissingProject: Clang-Tidy: compile_commands.json not found. Project analysis cannot run.
msg.compileCommandsMissingFile: Clang-Tidy: compile_commands.json not found. The file analysis may be incomplete.
msg.fileNotInCompilation: Clang-Tidy: file is not present in compile_commands.json and may not be analyzed.
msg.compileCommandsNotFound: Clang-Tidy: compile_commands.json not found. Configure clangTidy.compileCommandsPath or generate it.
msg.detectedClangTidy: Detected clang-tidy {0} at {1}. Use this path?
msg.unsupportedLanguage: Clang-Tidy works only for C/C++ files. Current language: {0}.
msg.clangTidyTooOld: Detected clang-tidy {0}. Minimum recommended version is {1}.
msg.generateCompileCommandsBody:
CMake: cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON
Meson: meson setup builddir (compile_commands.json will be in builddir)
Then set clangTidy.compileCommandsPath if the file is not in the workspace root.
msg.totalDiagnosticsCap: Clang-Tidy: total diagnostics cap exceeded ({0}). Consider narrowing checks.
msg.unsavedTooLarge: Clang-Tidy: unsaved buffer too large for {0} (>{1} bytes).
msg.baselineRequiresPersist: Baseline requires persistResults to be enabled.
msg.baselineEmpty: No persisted results found. Run project analysis first.
msg.projectAdaptiveBatch: Clang-Tidy: adaptive batching reduced to {0} files per batch.
msg.gitDiffUnavailable: Clang-Tidy: git diff-only mode unavailable (not a git repo or git not found). Falling back to full project.
msg.gitDiffEmpty: Clang-Tidy: no changed files to analyze (diff-only).
msg.projectNoFiles: Clang-Tidy: no eligible files to analyze in project.
msg.filterNoCheck: Diagnostic has no clang-tidy check code.
msg.fixAllRequiresPersist: Fix-all requires persistResults to be enabled.
msg.fixAllEmpty: No persisted results found. Run project analysis first.
